name: Introductory Biology
description: Introductory course to the field of biology, covering the basics of the scientific method, cell structure, and genetics.

name: Principles of Genetics
description: Course covering genetics, including Mendelian genetics, gene expression, population genetics, and genetic engineering.

name: Introductory Ecology
description: Course covering the basics of ecology, including the study of populations, communities, ecosystems, and biomes.

name: Animal Physiology
description: Course covering the physiology of animals, including the anatomy and physiology of organs, the nervous system, and the endocrine system.

name: Introduction to Zoology
description: Course introducing the study of zoology, including the classification of animals, evolution of animals, and behavior.
